document.full_text: japanese electronics manufacturer toshiba corp said on thursday it will buy unlisted swiss-based meter maker landis+gyr in a deal valued at $2.3 billion, including debt, in a bid to move into the promising overseas smart grid market.
document.title: toshiba to buy meter maker landis+gyr for $2.3 billion
lines_and_colors: japanese electronics manufacturer toshiba corp said on thursday it will buy unlisted swiss-based meter maker landis+gyr in a deal valued at $2.3 billion, including debt, in a bid to move into the promising overseas smart grid market.
